# Reconcile branch hygiene and preserve runtime remediation scope

Ensure branch diffs/commits are clean after cache cleanup while preserving intended runtime/source changes for active Wave 1.2 work.

## Scope
In scope: branch diff hygiene, scoped commit reconciliation, and explicit handling decision for `.npmrc` (`commit` vs `ignore`) based on runtime needs.
Out of scope: new product features.

## Inputs
[Spec](intent://local/note/spec)
Active runtime task: [Unblock Electron runtime install for dev startup](intent://local/task/fe99cd34-6c78-45e5-b3b2-a60cebae3faf)

## Definition of Done
- Branch no longer contains accidental `.pnpm-store/**` diffs.
- Intended runtime/source changes remain intact and reviewable.
- `.npmrc` handling is documented in task note and aligned with project policy: commit `.npmrc`.

## Verification
- `git diff --name-only origin/unblock-wave-1-verification...HEAD`
- `git status --short`
- `git log --oneline --decorate -n 10`
